WHAT

The more you participate,
the less you pay

Fab Market is an online market where you can find a variety of locally made products designed by people from all over the world. Products are sold ready for use, assembly or fabrication , giving the user the ability to participate in the making process. The more he participates, the less he pays for the products.

With digital fabrication quality products can be customized, resourced, made and sold locally supporting communities, at the same time bringing the users closer to the making of the things they own.

Read the full manifesto

SELL YOUR DESIGN

Design
approval process

Fab Market wants to offer good designs made to last and therefore all products need to be approved and tested before going on sale. Products have to be fairly easy to fabricate and come with step by step assembly instructions.

Designers and makers can present their creations to the Fab Market, and once they are approved, they are invited to their local FabShop for prototyping and testing.

In exchange for excellence FabLab Barcelona will offer the creators a special discount of fabrication every time their product is sold.

Submit a design
